title: Akebi-chan no Sailor-fuku
overview: It's Komichi Akebi's first year of junior high school and she has her heart set on one thing: Robai Private Academy's sailor uniform. As the next chapter of her life gets closer, she dreams of all the exciting new experiences she'll get to haveâ€”school lunches, classes, club activities, and of course, making lots of friends! With her favourite outfit on, Komichi feels ready for anything.
